suggested_solutions.feature_name: AI Agent for FAQ & First Response
suggested_solutions.description: Automatically answers repetitive customer questions using an AI agent.
suggested_solutions.how_it_helps: Reduces support volume by handling common queries instantly.

suggested_solutions.description: Use AI to extract key themes and sentiments from open-ended feedback.
suggested_solutions.how_it_helps: Saves time by automating feedback analysis.

suggested_solutions.description: Send surveys automatically after transactions via email or SMS.
suggested_solutions.how_it_helps: Improves feedback collection without manual effort.

suggested_solutions.description: Consolidate all customer interactions across channels in one view.
suggested_solutions.how_it_helps: Provides a single view of customer touchpoints to improve service quality.

suggested_solutions.description: Analyze customer feedback and operational data across the journey.
suggested_solutions.how_it_helps: Find friction points in key touchpoints.
